name: Skog
description:
Skog is Skywares newest and still in-work game. The game is an action platformer where the hero has a knife he can trow at his enimies to slay them. The game is going to be focusing on norwegian folk fairytales with trolls and such, thats the reason behind the name "skog" wich means forest in norwegian.

Release date:

The game is supposed to be released in september 2019 on windows and will later be ported to android and browser.

Game art by:

Skyware

Buch

Ansimuz

Music by:

syncopica

marcelofg55

cynicmusic
